item.description: On November 23rd and 24th there has been the annual Android Dev Summit from the Computer History Museum in Mountain View. This is a note-to-self about the related YouTube channel.

item.description: Android Studio 1.0 has been released. Android Studio is the official Integrated Development Environment (IDE) from the Android team.
